easyStandard.skull: -X. X is the number of _Monster_ enemies in play.
easyStandard.cultist: -2. Place 1 doom on the nearest enemy.
easyStandard.tablet: -3. If there is a _Monster_ enemy at your location, take 1 damage.
easyStandard.elderThing: -5. If there is an _Ancient One_ enemy in play, reveal another token.

hardExpert.skull: -3. If you fail, after this skill test, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a _Monster_ enemy, and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
hardExpert.cultist: -4. Place 2 doom on the nearest enemy.
hardExpert.tablet: -5. If there is a _Monster_ enemy at your location, take 1 damage and 1 horror.
hardExpert.elderThing: -7. If there is an _Ancient One_ enemy in play, reveal another token.
